summary: Root cause identified: Gmail OAuth2 refresh token has expired/revoked (invalid_grant error). Fix requires re-running 'himalaya account configure gmail' in terminal to obtain fresh tokens via browser authentication.

artifacts.summary: Research report documenting OAuth2 token expiration as root cause, configuration analysis, and fix procedure

next_steps: Run /plan 78 to create implementation plan, though fix is straightforward CLI command

metadata.root_cause: OAuth2 refresh token expired or revoked by Google (invalid_grant)
